sentences.english: The nominees are formally chosen by delegates at the parties' conventions in the summer.
sentences.chinese: 正式提名爲代表黨的候選人將在夏季黨代會決定。

sentences.english: The CPC has explored the system of standing party congress in the close period.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分，新時期黨對黨代會常任制的有益探索。
